Package wordsCount

Class wordCounterGui

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
wordsCount.wordCounterGui
public class wordCounterGui extends javafx.application.Application
The program use javafx libraries to display a basic gun which accept a input from a Url or local file then display the result for all the words and their counts Also the top 20 words and their counts
Since:
2021 -10-27
Version:
1.0
Author:
Gregory Lauture
